author: bridge-bot
content:
<CarlBeek> Currently there is nothing on the agenda for RollCall #12 this week. Please feel free to add anything you think is worth discussing, if it is still empty by Tues 14:00 UTC, I will cancel the call.

Agenda here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1431

author: bridge-bot
content:
<adietrichs> On a more general note - Ethereum L1 is currently going through a cycle of major updates to the overall roadmap and strategy. I would expect that there will be more clarity over the next ~3 months on topics like the future of the L1 execution system and the relationship with L2s around that.

We plan to re-assess the situation of RollCall and the RIPs (and common core) effort once that reaches stability, to see how this group can be maximally useful going forward.
